userManagement.feature1: Di ezãlawo eye nàɖe wo ɖa le woƒe ŋkɔ, e-mail, alo akpa si wowɔ nu
userManagement.feature2: Kpɔ zãla ƒe nɔnɔmetatawo kple dɔwɔna ŋutinya tsitotsito
userManagement.feature3: Trɔ asi le zãla ƒe akpawo kple mɔɖeɖewo ŋu
userManagement.feature4: Trɔ asi le zãla ƒe akɔntabubuwo ŋu alo tutu wo ne ehiã
userManagement.rolesDesc: Dɔ vevitɔ etɔ̃ le hoʋiʋlia si:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Full platform access kple system configuration ŋutetewo
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: Ekpɔa woƒe dɔwɔƒea ƒe ƒuƒoƒo kple ɖoɖowo dzi
userManagement.role3: Zãla: Nyatakakawo wɔwɔ kple wo me dzodzro ƒe nɔnɔme siwo sɔ
userManagement.warning: Kpɔ ŋusẽ si wòkpɔ ɖe ame dzi ɖa ɣesiaɣi hafi nàtrɔ zãla ƒe akpawo alo atutu akɔntabubuwo ɖa. Nuwɔna siawo ate ŋu akpɔ ŋusẽ ɖe ƒuƒoƒo ƒe dɔwɔwɔ dzi.

analytics.intro: Kukuɖenuŋu naa gɔmesese deto le alesi wole mɔ̃a zãm le dɔwɔƒewo kple ezãlawo katã me ŋu.
analytics.metric1: Total active users kple dzidziɖedzi ƒe nɔnɔmewo
analytics.metric2: Emenyawo wɔwɔ kple wo me dzodzro ƒe agbɔsɔsɔme
analytics.metric3: Nuƒolanɔƒe ƒe nuwɔwɔ aduadu ƒe agbɔsɔsɔme
analytics.metric5: Sedziwɔwɔ kple afɔku ƒe dzesiwo le dɔwɔƒewo katã me
analytics.tip: Miɖo numekuku ŋuti nyatakakawo ɖe duta hena amesiwo kpɔ gome le eme ƒe nuƒoƒo to Download Report ƒe nɔnɔmea zazã me.

financials.intro: Ganyawo ƒe Kpɔɖeŋu ƒe akpaa naa nukpɔkpɔ le mɔ̃a ƒe gakpɔkpɔ kple nudɔdɔ ƒe xexlẽdzesiwo me.
financials.revenueDesc: Lé ŋku ɖe ganyawo ƒe lãmesẽ kple nudɔdɔ ƒe nɔnɔmewo ŋu le dɔwɔƒewo katã me.
financials.feature1: Ɣleti sia ɣleti ƒe gakpɔkpɔ si gbugbɔna (MRR) yometiti

systemConfig.intro: System configuration na nète ŋu kpɔa platform-wide settings kple integrations dzi.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Trɔ asi le ame etɔ̃lia ƒe ƒoƒo ɖekae ŋu eye nàlé ŋku ɖe wo ŋu:
systemConfig.integration2: AI subɔsubɔdɔwo na nyatakakawo dzidzi kple wo me dzodzro
systemConfig.integration3: Fexexe ƒe dɔwɔwɔ to Stripe dzi
systemConfig.tip: Do ƒoƒo ɖekaewo kpɔ ɣesiaɣi le fefewɔƒe ƒe nɔnɔme me hafi nàwɔ tɔtrɔwo le ewɔwɔ ƒe ɖoɖowo ŋu.

gettingStarted.intro: Míexɔ mi nyuie ɖe Contentry me! Abe Dɔwɔƒea Dzikpɔla ene la, dɔwɔnu siwo nàtsɔ akpɔ wò ƒuƒoƒoa dzi, aɖo nyatakakawo ƒe mɔfiamewo, eye nàkpɔ egbɔ be adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe ɖekawɔwɔ le asiwò.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Wɔ ɖe afɔɖeɖe siawo dzi nàtsɔ aɖo wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe akɔnta:
gettingStarted.step1: Yi Settings > Enterprise be nàge ɖe wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe dashboard me
gettingStarted.step2: Da wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ŋuti mɔfiamewo kple ɖoɖowo ɖe Sidzedze Dɔwɔƒea
gettingStarted.step3: Kpe wò ƒuƒoƒoa me tɔwo eye nàde dɔ siwo sɔ asi na wo
gettingStarted.step4: Trɔ asi le mɔɖeɖedɔa ŋu hena emenyawo me toto
gettingStarted.tip: Wu wò Sidzedze Dɔwɔƒe ƒe ɖoɖoa nu hafi nàkpe ƒuƒoƒoa me tɔwo be nàkpɔ egbɔ be yewokpɔ adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe mɔfiamewo tso ŋkeke gbãtɔ dzi.

teamManagement.intro: Ƒuƒoƒoa dzikpɔkpɔ nyuie kpɔa egbɔ be nuwɔwɔ aduadu le edzi yim nyuie eye wokpɔa mɔ nyuitɔ dzi le wò habɔbɔa me.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Tsɔ ame yeyewo kpe ɖe wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe ƒuƒoƒoa ŋu:
teamManagement.feature1: Ŋlɔ ƒuƒoƒoa me tɔ ƒe e-mail adrɛs
teamManagement.feature2: Tia woƒe akpa (Wɔla, Dɔdzikpɔla, alo Dɔdzikpɔla) .
teamManagement.feature3: Tsɔ ame ŋutɔ ƒe gbedasi si nàdi kpe ɖe amekpekpea ŋu
teamManagement.rolesDesc: De akpa siwo wotu ɖe agbanɔamedziwo dzi:
teamManagement.role1: Wɔla: Ate ŋu awɔ nyatakakawo ahaɖo wo ɖa be woada asi ɖe wo dzi
teamManagement.role2: Dɔdzikpɔla: Ate ŋu ada asi ɖe/gbe nu siwo le eme eye wòakpɔ nuwɔlawo dzi
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Dɔwɔƒe bliboa ƒe mɔɖeɖe si me fexexe kple ɖoɖowo hã le
teamManagement.tip: Amekpekpewo wu enu le ŋkeke 7 megbe. Ðo ŋku edzi na ƒuƒoƒoa me tɔwo be woaxɔ woƒe amekpekpewo kaba.

knowledgeBase.intro: Sidzedze Dɔwɔƒea nye wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe nudzraɖoƒe vevitɔ si me wodzraa adzɔnu ƒe ŋkɔ ƒe mɔfiamewo, ɖoɖowo, kple emenyawo ŋuti sewo ɖo. Nuŋlɔɖi siwo woda ɖe afisia naa nyatakaka siwo AI wɔ na ƒuƒoƒoa me tɔwo katã.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Tsɔ nuŋlɔɖi siwo afia mɔ nyatakakawo wɔwɔ kpee:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Adzɔnu ƒe atsyã ƒe mɔfiamewo kple gbe ƒe mɔfiamewo
knowledgeBase.docType3: Mɔfiame siwo ku ɖe nyatakakawo ɖoɖo ɖe hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒewo ŋu
knowledgeBase.docType4: Sedede siwo ku ɖe dɔwɔƒewo koŋ ŋu
knowledgeBase.tip: Da wò adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe mɔfiame vevitɔwo ɖe Internet dzi gbã. AI la tsɔa nuŋlɔɖi siwo le dɔwɔƒea ƒe Sidzedze Dɔwɔƒea ɖoa nɔƒe gbãtɔ wu zãla ɖekaɖekawo ƒe nyatakakawo ɖoɖo ɖe Internet dzi.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Dɔwɔwɔ si dzi woda asi ɖo la kpɔa egbɔ be nyatakakaawo katã ɖo wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe dzidzenuwo gbɔ hafi wota wo.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Emenyawo sina toa afɔɖeɖe siawo me:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Wɔla ye wɔa emenyawo alo kua wo me
approvalWorkflow.step2: Wotsɔa emenyawo ɖona ɖa be woada asi ɖe edzi (ne ehiã) .
approvalWorkflow.step3: Dɔdzikpɔla léa ŋku ɖe eŋu eye wònaa nyatakakawo
approvalWorkflow.step4: Woate ŋu ata nyatakaka siwo dzi woda asi ɖo ɖe hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒewo
approvalWorkflow.warning: Na mɔɖeɖe ƒe nudidiwo nawɔ dɔ le Ðoɖowo me be nàkpɔ egbɔ be woto emenyawo katã me hafi wota wo.

billing.intro: Dzra wò dɔwɔƒea ƒe nudɔdɔ dzi eye nàlé ŋku ɖe gaxɔgbalẽvi zazã ŋu.
billing.feature1: Ðoɖo si li fifia ŋuti nyatakakawo kple gaxɔgbalẽviwo mama

adminUsersPage.title: Zãla ƒe Dɔwɔnyawo Dzikpɔkpɔ
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Dzra nuƒolanɔƒea katã zãlawo dzi
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Di nu to email alo ŋkɔ dzi...

toasts.loadFailed: Do kpo agba tsɔtsɔ na zãlawo
toasts.updateFailed: Do kpo nu yeye wɔwɔ na zãla
toasts.updateSuccess: Zãla la trɔ asi le eŋu dzidzedzetɔe

adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Èka ɖe edzi be yedi be yeatutu zãla sia ɖaa?
adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Womate ŋu atrɔ nuwɔna sia o.

deleteModal.title: Tsɔ Zãla la Tutu
deleteModal.description: Esia atutu zãla la kple nyatakaka siwo katã do ƒome kplii ɖa tegbee:
deleteModal.irreversible: Womate ŋu atrɔ nuwɔna sia o.

gettingStarted.intro: Míexɔ mi nyuie ɖe Contentry me! Mɔfiame sia akpe ɖe ŋuwò nàwɔ nyatakaka siwo ŋu kakaɖedzi le, siwo sɔ ɖe se nu to dɔwɔnu siwo ŋu AI-ŋusẽ le zazã me.
gettingStarted.step1: Ðo wò nyatakakawo kple nyatakaka siwo de pɛpɛpɛ
gettingStarted.step3: Wɔ Strategic Profile na wò adzɔnu ƒe dzesi alo dɔdzikpɔha
gettingStarted.tip: Dze egɔme kple Aɖaŋuɖoɖo ƒe Nyatakaka be nàkpɔ egbɔ be wò nyatakakawo katã ƒe gbeɖiɖi kple gbedasiwo sɔ.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry ƒe AI-ŋusẽ ƒe nyatakakawo dzidzi kpena ɖe ŋuwò nèwɔa nyatakaka siwo doa dzidzɔ na ame le sɛkɛnd ʋɛ aɖewo ko me.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Wɔ nyatakakawo to AI zazã me:
contentCreation.feature1: Ŋlɔ tanya alo nyabiase aɖe si aɖɔ nusi ŋu nèdi be yeaɖo ɖe amewo
contentCreation.feature2: Tia wò taɖodzinu ƒe mɔnuwo (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, kple bubuawo) .
contentCreation.feature3: Tia gbeɖiɖi si nèdi be yeaŋlɔ
contentCreation.feature4: Ne èdi be yeawɔ nɔnɔmetata si kpe ɖe eŋu
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Wɔ ɖoɖo ɖe wò nyatakakawo ƒe ɣletigbalẽ ŋu:
contentCreation.schedule1: Ðo nyatakakawo wɔwɔ ƒe ɖoɖowɔɖi siwo gbugbɔna yia edzi
contentCreation.schedule2: Tia ŋkeke kple ɣeyiɣi tɔxɛ siwo dzi nàɖo nyatakakawo ɖe amewo le wo ɖokui si
contentCreation.schedule3: Na auto-posting alo manual review nawɔ dɔ hafi nàtae
contentCreation.tip: Zã ‘Dodoɖeŋgɔ ƒe Nyatakakawo’ ƒe dzesiɖaka ne èle asitsatsa ŋuti nyatakakawo wɔm be nàkpɔ egbɔ be sedziwɔwɔ ŋuti numekuku bu boblododo ƒe mɔfiamewo ŋu.

analyzeContent.intro: Analyze Content ƒe akpaa léa ŋku ɖe wò nyatakakawo ŋu be wowɔ ɖe seawo dzi, dekɔnuwo ƒe seselelãme, kple adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe ɖekawɔwɔ hã.
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Miɖo emenyawo ɖa be woaku wo me:
analyzeContent.step1: Yi Emenyawo ƒe Ðoɖowɔwɔ > Dzro emenyawo me
analyzeContent.step2: Kpe wò nyatakakawo ɖe nuŋɔŋlɔa ƒe teƒea
analyzeContent.step3: Tia Aɖaŋuɖoɖo ƒe Nyatakaka aɖe na nya siwo ƒo xlãe
analyzeContent.step4: Zi Analyze dzi be nàxɔ nyatakaka tsitotsito
analyzeContent.type1: Dɔwɔƒea ƒe ɖoɖowo kple mɔfiamewo dzi wɔwɔ
analyzeContent.type2: Dekɔnuwo ƒe seselelãme le nuto vovovowo me
analyzeContent.type3: Brand gbe kple gbeɖiɖi ƒe ɖekawɔwɔ
analyzeContent.type4: Afɔku siwo ate ŋu ado tso eme kple aɖaŋuɖoɖowo
analyzeContent.tip: Dzro emenyawo me ɣesiaɣi hafi nàta wo ɖe gotagome mɔ̃wo dzi, vevietɔ na dɔdzikpɔha siwo woɖo taɖodzinu na nuto geɖe.

strategicProfiles.intro: Strategic Profiles ɖea nya siwo ƒo xlãe, gbeɖiɖi, kple mɔfiame siwo ku ɖe emenyawo wɔwɔ kple wo me dzodzro ŋu.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Ðe ame siwo ŋu nyatakakadzraɖoƒea le kple taɖodzinua me
strategicProfiles.feature2: Ðo dekɔnuwo kple nutomenuwo ŋu bubu
strategicProfiles.feature3: Tsɔ nuŋlɔɖi kple mɔfiame siwo ku ɖe wò profile koŋ ŋu la da ɖe Internet dzi
strategicProfiles.feature4: Trɔ asi le gbeɖiɖi kple atsyã ƒe tiatia gbãtɔwo ŋu
strategicProfiles.tip: Wɔ Aɖaŋuɖoɖowo ƒe Nyatakaka vovovowo na dɔdzikpɔha vovovowo, adzɔnuwɔƒewo, alo nutome asiwo.

socialAccounts.intro: Do ka kple wò hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒewo be nàta nyatakakawo tso Contentry gbɔ tẽ.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Nuƒolanɔƒe siwo wodoa alɔe dometɔ aɖewoe nye:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Ame ŋutɔ kple Dɔwɔƒe ƒe axawo
socialAccounts.warning: Na wò hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe kadodowo nanɔ yeye. Token siwo ƒe ɣeyiɣi wu enu ate ŋu axe mɔ na nyatakaka siwo woɖo ɖi be woagata o.

approvalProcess.intro: Ne wò dɔwɔƒea na mɔɖeɖedɔa ƒe ɖoɖowo wɔ dɔ la, ele be woalé ŋku ɖe emenyawo ŋu hafi ata wo.
approvalProcess.submitTitle: Nuwo ɖoɖo ɖa be woada asi ɖe edzi
approvalProcess.step1: Wɔ wò nyatakakawo alo ku wo me
approvalProcess.step2: Zi ‘Submit for Approval’ dzi be nàɖoe ɖe wò dɔdzikpɔla
approvalProcess.step3: Kpɔ mɔɖeɖe ƒe nɔnɔme le Pending Approval fli me
approvalProcess.tip: Tsɔ nuŋlɔɖiwo kpee ne èle nyatakakawo ɖom ɖa be nàna nya siwo ƒo xlãe nadzro numetola siwo ku ɖe wò nuwɔwɔ ŋuti nyametsotsowo ŋu.

aboutGuide.title: Ku ɖe & Nuwɔna Nyuitɔwo Ŋu
aboutGuide.description: Srɔ̃ nusi Contentry nye na eye nàke ɖe mɔnu nyuitɔ siwo dzi nàto awɔ wò nyatakakawo wɔwɔ, adzɔnu ƒe ŋkɔ ƒe nubablawo, kple ŋusẽkpɔɖeamedzilawo ƒe nɔnɔmetatawo ŋudɔ nyuie wu.
aboutGuide.feature2: Aɖaŋuɖoɖo Siwo Ku Ðe Emenyawo Ŋu Nyuie

sections.optimizeContent: Trɔ Asi Le Wò Nyatakakawo Ŋu Nyuie Wu

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry nye nyatakakawo ŋuti nunya ƒe mɔnu si ŋu AI-ŋusẽ le si wowɔ be wòakpe ɖe nyatakakawo wɔlawo, asitsalawo, kple dɔwɔƒewo ŋu woawɔ nyatakaka siwo sɔ ɖe se nu, adzro wo me, ahata wo le agbɔsɔsɔ me. Eɖanye ame ɖekaɖeka si kpɔa ŋusẽ ɖe amewo dzi alo asitsatsa ƒe ƒuƒoƒo gã aɖe me tɔ o, Contentry naa wò nyatakakawo ƒe dɔwɔwɔ nɔa bɔbɔe wu.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Míexɔe se be míado ŋusẽ nuwɔlawo kple dɔwɔnu siwo me nunya le siwo kpɔa egbɔ be nyatakaka ɖesiaɖe le adzɔnu ƒe ŋkɔ me, si me dekɔnuwo le, eye wòwɔ ɖe mɔ̃a ƒe mɔfiamewo dzi.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: AI-ŋusẽ ƒe nyatakakawo dzidzi si sɔ kple wò adzɔnu ƒe dzesi ƒe gbe
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Ɣeyiɣi ŋutɔŋutɔ me ŋkuléle ɖe sedziwɔwɔ ŋu hena sewo ƒe nudidiwo
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Dekɔnuwo ƒe seselelãmewo me dzodzro na xexeame katã ƒe nyaselawo
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Dɔwɔwɔ ƒe ɖoɖo siwo wowɔ be woada asi ɖe edzi na dɔwɔƒewo ƒe ƒuƒoƒowo
whatIsContentry.tip: Nyaʋiʋli ƒoa AI ƒe ŋusẽ kple amegbetɔ ƒe dzikpɔkpɔ nu ƒu tsɔ tsɔa nyatakaka siwo ɖina na wò nyaselawo esime nèle sewo dzi wɔm.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry na dɔwɔnu gbogbo aɖewo siwo nàtsɔ akpɔ wò nyatakakawo ƒe agbenɔƒe bliboa dzi:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Wɔ nyatakaka deŋgɔ siwo sɔ ɖe wò adzɔnu ƒe dzeside kple nyaselawo nu:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Nyatakakawo ƒe dzidzime le mɔ̃ vovovowo dzi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) .
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Nuŋɔŋlɔ ƒe gbeɖiɖi siwo woate ŋu atrɔ asi le (Dɔwɔla, Ðokuisi, Gbɔgbɔmeʋaʋã)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI nɔnɔmetata dzidzime be woatsɔ akpe ɖe wò nyawo ŋu
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Kpɔ egbɔ be wò nyatakakawo ɖo nudidiwo katã gbɔ hafi nàtae:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Sedziwɔwɔ me dzodzro le wo ɖokui si le dɔwɔƒea ƒe ɖoɖowo nu
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Dekɔnuwo ƒe seselelãme ƒe dzesidede na dukɔwo dome nyaselawo
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Afɔkuwo me dzodzro kple aɖaŋuɖoɖo siwo ŋu woate ŋu awɔ nane le
keyFeatures.tip: Zã Strategic Profiles nàtsɔ akpɔ egbɔ be adzɔnu ƒe dzesi ƒe gbe le ɖeka le nyatakaka siwo katã wowɔ me.

bestPractices.intro: Nuwɔna nyuitɔ siawo dzi wɔwɔ akpe ɖe ŋuwò nàkpɔ viɖe geɖe tso Contentry me eye nàwɔ nyatakaka siwo awɔ dɔ nyuie:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Ðo Emenyawo ƒe Dɔwɔɖoɖo aɖe anyi
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Dɔwɔwɔ ƒe ɖoɖo si mewɔa tɔtrɔ o kpɔa egbɔ be enyo eye wòwɔa dɔ nyuie:
bestPractices.workflow1: Dze egɔme kple wò Strategic Profile ɖoɖo kple adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe mɔfiamewo
bestPractices.workflow2: Wɔ nyatakakawo kple nuƒolanɔƒe kple nyaselawo koŋ le susu me
bestPractices.workflow3: Dzro emenyawo me ɣesiaɣi hafi nàta wo ɖe gotagome mɔ̃wo dzi
bestPractices.workflow4: Zã ɖoɖowɔɖi ƒe nɔnɔmewo be nàlé nyatakakawo ɖoɖo ɖe amewo ƒe ɖoɖo si mewɔa tɔtrɔ o me ɖe asi
bestPractices.consistencyTitle: Lé adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe ɖekawɔwɔ me ɖe asi
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ɣesiaɣi tua kakaɖedzi kple dzesidede ame ɖo:
bestPractices.consistency1: Da wò adzɔnu ƒe atsyã ƒe mɔfiamegbalẽ ɖe Sidzedze Dɔwɔƒea
bestPractices.consistency2: Zã Aɖaŋuɖoɖo ƒe Nyatakaka ma ke na dɔdzikpɔha siwo do ƒome kplii
bestPractices.consistency3: Dzro nyatakaka siwo AI wɔ me be nàkpɔ egbɔ be wosɔ kple wò gbe
bestPractices.warning: Dzro nyatakaka siwo AI wɔ me ɣesiaɣi hafi nàta wo. Togbɔ be ŋusẽ le míaƒe AI ŋu hã la, amegbetɔ ƒe dzikpɔkpɔ nana be nu nyuitɔ kekeake dona tso eme.

optimizeContent.intro: Nyatakaka gãwo wɔwɔ nye gɔmedzedze ko. Alesi nàwɔ awɔe wòanyo wu be nàte ŋu awɔ dɔ geɖe wue nye esi:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Nudidi tɔxɛwo kple nyaselawo ƒe mɔkpɔkpɔwo le nuƒolanɔƒe ɖesiaɖe ŋu:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Lé fɔ ɖe dɔnyala ƒe gɔmesesewo ŋu, zã dɔwɔƒea ƒe nya veviwo, nɔnɔme didi si dzi woda asi ɖo
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Gbedasɛwo ɖoɖoɖa kpuie, zã hashtags le aɖaŋu me, ƒo ɖokuiwò ɖe nyati siwo le ŋgɔ yim me
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Nukpɔkpɔwo wɔa dɔ nyuie, dea nutoa me tɔwo ƒe gomekpɔkpɔ le eme ƒe dzi ƒo
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Nukpɔkpɔ deŋgɔwo hiã, zã hashtag siwo sɔ, Ŋutinyawo hena ŋugbedodo
optimizeContent.engagementTitle: Do Nuwɔwɔ Ðe Ŋusẽ Ðe Edzi
optimizeContent.engagement1: Ðo nyatakakawo ɖe amewo ɣesiaɣi le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔwo me na wò nyaselawo
optimizeContent.engagement2: Zã yɔyɔ siwo ƒonɛ ɖe ame nu be woawɔ nane le wò nyatakakawo me
optimizeContent.engagement3: Ðo nya siwo wogblɔ ŋu eye nàƒo nu kple wò nutoa me tɔwo
optimizeContent.engagement4: Lé ŋku ɖe numekukuwo ŋu be nàse nyatakaka siwo wɔa dɔ nyuie wu gɔme
optimizeContent.tip: Zã Contentry ƒe ɖoɖowɔɖi ƒe dɔwɔnu nàtsɔ aɖo nyatakakawo ɖe amewo le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔwo me asi agbagbadzedze manɔmee.

brandDeals.intro: Adzɔnu ƒe ŋkɔ ƒe hadomeɖoɖo ate ŋu anye gakpɔkpɔ ƒe mɔnu vevi aɖe. Alesi nàwɔ wò mɔnua wòanyo wue nye esi:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Dzadzraɖo ɖe Adzɔnu ƒe Habɔbɔ ƒe Habɔbɔwo Ŋu
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Dzra ɖo ne mɔnukpɔkpɔwo do mo ɖa:
brandDeals.prep1: Lé nyatakakawo ƒe agbalẽvi si me dɔnyala bibiwo le, si mewɔa tɔtrɔ o me ɖe asi
brandDeals.prep2: Kpɔ wò ŋugbedodo ƒe xexlẽdzesiwo yome eye nàɖe wo afia
brandDeals.prep3: Tu nyadzɔdzɔgblɔmɔnuwo ƒe dɔwɔnu si me wò amewo ƒe xexlẽme le eye nàɖo wo gbɔ
brandDeals.prep4: Zã Contentry nàtsɔ awɔ kpɔɖeŋu branded content concepts
brandDeals.pitch1: Na wò gbeɖiɖi nasɔ kple adzɔnuawo ƒe dzidzenuwo kple amesiwo ŋu nèle nu ƒom tsoe
brandDeals.pitch2: Na emenyawo ŋuti susu tɔxɛwo tsɔ wu be nàna aɖaŋuɖoɖo siwo ku ɖe nusianu ŋu
brandDeals.pitch3: De sedziwɔwɔ ŋuti numekuku eme be nàɖee afia be wò nyatakakawo ɖo mɔfiamewo gbɔ
brandDeals.tip: Zã Contentry ƒe sedziwɔwɔ me dzodzro ne èle nyatakaka siwo wodo alɔe wɔm be nàkpɔ egbɔ be wowɔ ɖe FTC kple mɔ̃ dzi nyatakakawo ɖeɖefia ƒe nudidiwo dzi.

influencerProfiles.intro: Wò Aɖaŋuɖoɖo Ŋuti Nyatakakae nye wò nyatakakawo ƒe aɖaŋuɖoɖo ƒe gɔmeɖoanyi. Alesi nàwɔe wòanyo wue nye esi:
influencerProfiles.setupTitle: Wò Nyatakakawo Ðoɖo Ðe Ðoɖo Nu
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profile si woɖo nyuie kpɔa egbɔ be nyatakaka siwo mewɔa tɔtrɔ o, siwo le adzɔnu ƒe ŋkɔ me:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Ðe wò niche kple ame siwo ŋu nèɖo taɖodzinu ɖo la me nyuie
influencerProfiles.setup2: Ðo nuŋɔŋlɔ ƒe gbeɖiɖi kple atsyã si nèdi
influencerProfiles.setup3: Tsɔ dekɔnu kple nutome ƒe nukpɔsusuwo kpee na wò nyaselawo
influencerProfiles.setup4: Tsɔ nufiamegbalẽ siwo ɖe wò adzɔnu ƒe dzesi ƒe gbe gɔme la da ɖe Internet dzi
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Yi edzi nàna wò nyatakakawo nanyo ɖe edzi be nu nyuiwo nado tso eme:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Dzro nyatakaka siwo wowɔ me eye nàtrɔ asi le profile ƒe ɖoɖowo ŋu ne ehiã
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Wɔ nɔnɔmetata geɖewo na dɔdzikpɔha alo nyasela vovovowo
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Na wò Sidzedze Dɔwɔƒea nanɔ yeyee kple adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ŋuti mɔfiame yeyewo
influencerProfiles.tip: To wò Strategic Profile me ɣleti etɔ̃ ɖesiaɖe be nàkpɔ egbɔ be eɖe wò adzɔnu ƒe dzesi kple nyaselawo si le tɔtrɔm la fia.

workflowsGuide.title: Dɔwɔwɔ ƒe ɖoɖowo & Dzesidede Mɔfiame
workflowsGuide.description: Srɔ̃ alesi dzesideɖoɖoa wɔa dɔe eye nàse dɔwɔwɔ ƒe afɔɖeɖe ɖesiaɖe gɔme tso emenyawo me dzodzro dzi va ɖo wo dzi dada dzi.

scoring.intro: Dzesideɖoɖo si le Contentry me naa dzeside si me kɔ, si wotu ɖe tohehe dzi be wòakpe ɖe ŋuwò nàse alesi wò nyatakakawo wɔa dɔe gɔme. Dzesiwo katã dzea egɔme tso 100 dzi eye woɖea dzesiwo le sedzidada alo nya aɖewo koŋ siwo ŋu woke ɖo ta.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Dzesi bliboa nye numekuku ƒe nusiwo katã wotsɔ ƒo ƒui si woda kpekpeme na, tso 0 va ɖo 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Enyo ŋutɔ - Wole klalo be woatae, wodzra emenyawo ɖo nyuie ŋutɔ
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Enyo - Wokafu ŋgɔyiyi suesuesuewo hafi woatae
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Hiahiã be woalé ŋku ɖe eŋu - Toto kple tɔtrɔwo hiã
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Nya veviwo, mègata wo o vaseɖe esime woakpɔ wo gbɔ
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Dzesi bliboa zãa kpekpeme si trɔna ɖe nɔnɔmewo ŋu si wotu ɖe afɔku ƒe seƒe dzi:
scoring.overallCalc4: Afɔku Vevi (Sedziwɔwɔ ≤40): Dzesi bliboa sesẽ-capped le 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: Wobua wò dzesi bliboa tso akpa vevi etɔ̃ me to ɖoɖo si wotu ɖe tohehe dzi zazã me:
scoring.component1: Sedziwɔwɔ ƒe Dzesi: Edzea egɔme tso 100 dzi, woɖea dzesiwo le sedzidada ɖesiaɖe si wokpɔ la me
scoring.component2: Dekɔnuwo ƒe Seselelãme ƒe Dzeside: Hofstede ƒe dekɔnu ƒe didime 6 ƒe mamã dedie
scoring.component3: Nyateƒetoto ƒe Dzesi: Edzea egɔme tso 100 dzi, eɖea dzesiwo le nyateƒetoto alo nyati ɖesiaɖe si ŋu woke ɖo me
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Sedziwɔwɔ ƒe Dzesi (si Wotu Ðe Tohehe Dzi) .
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Nyatakaka ɖesiaɖe dzea egɔme kple Sedziwɔwɔ ƒe Dzesi si nye 100. Woɖea dzesiwo le sedzidada ɖesiaɖe ta:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Sedzidada Vevi (-60 pts): NDA dzi dada, nyatakaka ɣaɣlawo ɖeɖe ɖe go → Afɔku si ate ŋu atso dɔa nu enumake
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Sedzidada Sesẽ (-40 pts): Fuɖename, vovototodedeameme, fulélenyawo → Senyawo gbɔ kpɔkpɔ ƒe afɔku
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Sedzidada Gã (-25 pts): Boblododowo ɖeɖefia si bu, ɖoɖowo dzi dada → Tohehe/afɔku si woatsɔ adzudzɔ dɔa wɔwɔ
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Sedzidada si sɔ (-10 pts): Gbeɖiɖi si mesɔ o, mɔfiame sue aɖe si to vovo → Hehenana/nuxlɔ̃ame
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Kpɔɖeŋu: #ad (-25) si bu + Tone issue (-10) = Dzesi mamlɛtɔ si nye 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Multiple violations stack - wowɔa tohehe ɖesiaɖe ŋudɔ le ƒuƒoƒo me
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Dzesidede sedzidadawo: Nya ɣaɣlawo, Fuɖename, NDA dzi dada, Nyaɖeɖefia si bu, Ðoɖowo dzi dada, Gbeɖiɖi si mesɔ o
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Dekɔnu ƒe dzesi nye Hofstede dekɔnu ƒe didime ade siwo dziɖuɖua da asi ɖo ƒe mamã dedie (0-100 ɖesiaɖe):
scoring.culturalDim1: Ŋusẽ ƒe Adzɔge: Gbeɖiɖi si wowɔna le ɖoɖo nu, bubudede ŋusẽ ŋu vs. egalitarian, gbe si wogblɔna le vome
scoring.culturalDim2: Ame ɖekaɖekawo ƒe nukpɔsusu vs. Habɔbɔ ƒe nukpɔsusu: ‘Nye/Nye’ ƒe susu tsɔtsɔ ɖe eŋu vs. ‘Mí/Mí’ ƒe nutoa me ƒe susu
scoring.culturalDim3: Ŋutsunyenye kple Nyɔnunyenye: Hoʋiʋli/aʋatsokaka vs. nuwɔwɔ aduadu/nusɔsrɔ̃ ƒe gbegbɔgblɔ
scoring.culturalDim4: Kakaɖedzimanɔamesi Ƒo asa na: Sewo, dedienɔnɔ, gbetete ɖe nya siwo me kɔ dzi vs. ʋuʋu ɖe nya siwo me mekɔ o ŋu
scoring.culturalDim5: Ɣeyiɣi Didi ƒe Mɔfiame: Etsɔme teƒeɖoɖowo ƒe susu tsɔtsɔ wu ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ƒe viɖewo
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Mɔkpɔkpɔbuɖeame/vivisese vs. gbegbɔgblɔ si wodzra ɖo ɖi/si dzi woɖu
scoring.culturalCalc: Dekɔnu ƒe Dzesi = (Dimension 6 ƒe xexlẽdzesiwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒo) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Ne Dekɔnu ƒe Dzeside ɖiɖi va anyi wu 50 la, wozãa ‘Ŋkɔ nyui ƒe Afɔku’ ƒe kpekpeme tsɔ kpɔa wò adzɔnu ƒe dzesi ta le xexeame katã ƒe nyaselawo dome
scoring.accuracyDetailTitle: Nyateƒetoto ƒe Dzesi (Enɔ te ɖe Tohehe Dzi) .
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Nya ɖesiaɖe si woŋlɔ la dzea egɔme kple Accuracy Score si nye 100. Woɖea dzesiwo le nya siwo ŋu woke ɖo ta:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Nyateƒetoto Gãwo/Nyatakaka Totrowo (-40 pts): Aʋatsonyawo, nyatakaka siwo wowɔ
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Dzɔtsoƒe si Dzi Womeka Ðe O (-20 pts): Nya siwo wogblɔ tso teƒe siwo dzi womate ŋu aka ɖo o
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Nya siwo womate ŋu akpɔ le nyateƒe me o
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Kpɔɖeŋu: Aʋatsonya (-40) + Dzɔtsoƒe si ŋu womeɖo kpee o (-20) = Dzesi mamlɛtɔ si nye 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Nya geɖewo ƒoa ƒu - wowɔa tohehe ɖesiaɖe ŋudɔ le ƒuƒoƒo me
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Wonɔa te ɖe numekuku me tsonu dzi dea dzesi emenyawo le wo ɖokui si:
scoring.flag1: Nyatakaka Nyui (Green): Dzesi siwo wu 80 - wole klalo be woata
scoring.flag2: Hiahiã be Woalé ŋku Ðe Eŋu (Dzĩ): Dzesi 60-79 - wokafu ŋgɔyiyi suesuesuewo
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Dzesi 40-59 - wobia be woagbugbɔ ŋku alé ɖe eŋu hafi woatae
scoring.flag4: Nya Veviwo (Dzĩ): Dzesi siwo mede 40 o - mègatae o vaseɖe esime wokpɔ egbɔ
scoring.disclosureDesc: Le boblododo ŋuti nyatakakawo gome la, ɖoɖoa léa ŋku ɖe:
scoring.disclosure1: Nye Dodoɖeŋgɔ: Edea dzesii nenye be nyatakaka siwo le eme nye boblododo alo wodo alɔe
scoring.disclosure2: Has Disclosure: Eléa ŋku ɖe #ad, #sponsored, alo hadomehabɔbɔ ƒe nyatakakawo ɖeɖefia nyuie ŋu
scoring.disclosure3: Nutome Sedziwɔwɔ: Eɖoa kpe FTC (US), EU, kple Norway ƒe nudidi siwo ku ɖe nyatakakawo ɖeɖe ɖe go ŋu dzi
scoring.disclosure4: Nyaɖeɖefia si bu hea Sedzidada Gã (-25 points) vɛ le Sedziwɔwɔ ƒe Dzesi dzi
scoring.tip: Wogbugbɔ bua xexlẽdzesiwo ɣesiaɣi si wodzro emenyawo me. Zã Gbugbɔ Ŋlɔ Nu ƒe nɔnɔmea nàtsɔ ana nyatakaka siwo mexɔ dzesi boo o nanyo ɖe edzi le ɖokuiwò si esime nèle wò gbedasi la me tom.

analyze.intro: Dzro emenyawo me dɔwɔwɔ ƒe ɖoɖoa kpena ɖe ŋuwò be nàda nyatakaka siwo li xoxo kpɔ be wowɔ ɖe seawo dzi, dekɔnuwo ƒe seselelãme, kple woƒe nyonyome hã hafi nàta wo.
analyze.stepsDesc: Wɔ ɖe afɔɖeɖe siawo dzi nàtsɔ adzro wò nyatakakawo me:
analyze.step1: Yi Emenyawo Ŋuti Nunya > Dzro Emenyawo me ƒe tab la me
analyze.step2: Kpe wò nyatakakawo ɖe nuŋɔŋlɔa ƒe akpaa dzi alo ŋlɔe
analyze.step3: Tia Aɖaŋuɖoɖo ƒe Nyatakaka aɖe be nàwɔ wò adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe mɔfiamewo ŋudɔ
analyze.step4: Ne èdi be yeakpɔ ‘Dzra nɔnɔmetata si kpe ɖe eŋu’ ne èdi be AI nawɔ nukpɔkpɔ
analyze.step5: Zi 'Analyze' dzi be nàwɔ numekuku bliboa
analyze.type1: Sedziwɔwɔ ƒe Dzodzro: Eɖoa kpe nyatakaka siwo le mɔ̃ dzi ƒe ɖoɖowo kple ɖoɖowo dzi (FTC, GDPR) .
analyze.type2: Dekɔnuwo ƒe Seselelãme: Eléa ŋku ɖe nyatakaka siwo ate ŋu ado dziku na ame alo esiwo me dekɔnuwo ƒe seselelãme mele o ŋu
analyze.type3: Nyateƒetoto ƒe Kpeɖodzi: Eléa ŋku ɖe nya siwo wogblɔ kple nyateƒenyawo ŋu be wosɔ pɛpɛpɛ hã
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: Etsɔa nyatakakawo sɔna kple wò Strategic Profile mɔfiamewo
analyze.tip: Zã ‘Gbugbɔ Ŋlɔ’ ƒe dzesi nàtsɔ ana nyatakaka siwo xɔ dzesi siwo mede 70 o nanyo ɖe edzi le eɖokui si.AI la akpɔ nya siwo wotsɔ aflaga ɖo la gbɔ esime wòle wò gbedasi la me tom.

generate.intro: Dɔwɔɖoɖo si nye Generate Content zãa AI tsɔ wɔa nyatakaka yeyewo si wotu ɖe wò tanya, platform ƒe nudidiwo, kple adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe mɔfiamewo dzi.
generate.step1: Yi Emenyawo Ŋuti Nunya > Emenyawo Dzidzi ƒe tab la dzi
generate.step2: Ŋlɔ wò tanya alo ɖɔ nusi nèdi be yeawɔ
generate.step3: Tia wò taɖodzinu ƒe nuƒolanɔƒe(wo) kple nuŋɔŋlɔ ƒe gbeɖiɖi
generate.step4: Tia Aɖaŋuɖoɖo ƒe Nɔnɔmetata hena adzɔnu ƒe dzeside ƒe ɖekawɔwɔ
generate.step5: Zi 'Generate' dzi be nàwɔ nyatakaka siwo ŋu AI-ŋusẽ le
generate.optionsDesc: Trɔ asi le wò nyatakaka siwo nèwɔ ŋu kple tiatia siawo:
generate.option1: Nuƒolanɔƒe Tiatia: Tia mɔ̃ ɖeka alo geɖe (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) .
generate.option2: Nuŋɔŋlɔ ƒe Gbeɖiɖi: Tia Dɔnyala, Dɔwɔnawo, Gbɔgbɔmeʋaʋã, alo Nyatakakawo dometɔ ɖeka
generate.option3: Emenyawo ƒe Didime: Trɔ asi le didime si nèdi be yeaɖo na wò nyatakakawo ŋu
generate.option4: Nɔnɔmetata Dzidzime: Trɔ ɖe eŋu be nàwɔ nɔnɔmetata si AI wɔ kpe ɖe eŋu
generate.tip: Wodzroa nyatakaka siwo wowɔ me le wo ɖokui si le wo wɔwɔ vɔ megbe. Dzro dzesiawo me eye nàzã nyaŋuɖoɖo ƒe dzesiwo atsɔ agbugbɔ awɔe ne ehiã.

schedulePrompt.intro: Ðoɖowɔɖi ƒe Nyabiase na nète ŋu ɖoa nyatakakawo wɔwɔ le wo ɖokui si si zɔna le ɣeyiɣi aɖewo me, si ana wò nyatakakawo ƒe ɣletigbalẽa nayɔ fũ kple asi ƒe nudede eme manɔmee.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Wɔ nyabiase siwo ana nyatakakawo nadze le wo ɖokui si:
schedulePrompt.step1: Wɔ wò nyatakakawo dzidzi ƒe nyabiase si me tanya kple nusiwo nèlɔ̃ le
schedulePrompt.step2: Ðo ɖoɖowɔɖia zi gbɔ zi geɖe (gbesiagbe, kwasiɖa sia kwasiɖa, alo ŋkeke aɖewo koŋ) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Tia ɣeyiɣi si me wòle be woawɔ nyatakakawo
schedulePrompt.step4: Na 'Auto-analyze' nawɔ numekuku le nyatakaka siwo wowɔ ŋu le eɖokui si
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Viɖe Siwo Le Ðoɖowɔɖi ƒe Nyabiasewo Ŋu
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Lé nyatakakawo ɖoɖo ɖe amewo ɣesiaɣi me ɖe asi gbesiagbe asidɔwɔwɔ manɔmee
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Wɔ nyatakakawo le nuwɔwɔ ƒe gaƒoƒo nyuitɔwo me
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Tu nyatakaka siwo tsi megbe be woalé ŋku ɖe wo ŋu ahada asi ɖe wo dzi
schedulePrompt.tip: Ðoɖowɔɖi ƒe nyabiasewo naa nyatakakawo vaa wò nuŋlɔɖiwo me. Dzro eme eye nàda asi ɖe edzi hafi nàtae be nàkpɔ egbɔ be enyo.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post na nète ŋu ɖoa nyatakaka siwo dzi woda asi ɖo la ɖe fli me be woata wo le wo ɖokui si le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ dzi le wò hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒe siwo do ƒome kplii la dzi.
schedulePost.howToTitle: Ale Si Nàwɔ Ðoɖo Ðe Nyatakakawo Ŋu
schedulePost.step1: Tso emenyawo kpɔkpɔ ɖesiaɖe me la, zi ‘Ðoɖowɔɖi’ dzi ɖe ‘Ta Fifia’ teƒe.
schedulePost.step2: Tia ŋkeke kple gaƒoƒo si nèdi be yeatae
schedulePost.step3: Tia hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒe siwo do ƒome kple wo nɔewo siwo dzi nàta agbalẽ ɖo
schedulePost.step4: Ðo kpe edzi eye nàtsɔe akpe ɖe wò fli si nèɖo ɖi ŋu
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Trɔ asi le wò nya siwo nèŋlɔ ɖe ɖoɖo nu ŋu:
schedulePost.option1: Ɣeyiɣi Tɔxɛ: Tia ŋkeke kple gaƒoƒo si tututu nàtae
schedulePost.option2: Ɣeyiɣi Nyuitɔ: Na AI naɖo aɖaŋu le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ siwo woatsɔ aɖo nyatakakawo ɖe amewo ŋu si wotu ɖe nubabla ƒe nyatakakawo dzi
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Wɔ ɖoɖo ɖe nyatakaka ɖeka ma ke ŋu le mɔ̃ geɖe dzi zi ɖeka
schedulePost.warning: Nyatakaka siwo woɖo ɖe ɖoɖo nu hiã hadomenyatakakadzraɖoƒe ɖeka ya teti si do ƒome kplii. Do ka kple akɔntabubuwo le Ðoɖowo > Hadomegbenɔnɔ Ŋuti Nyatakakawo me.

approval.intro: Dadaɖeanyi ƒe Dɔwɔɖoɖoa kpɔa egbɔ be emenyawo ƒe nyonyome to biabia be dɔdzikpɔla nalé ŋku ɖe eŋu hafi woatae me. Esia le vevie ŋutɔ na dɔwɔƒewo ƒe ƒuƒoƒowo kple dɔwɔƒe siwo ŋu wowɔ ɖoɖo ɖo.
approval.processDesc: Alesi emenyawo zɔna to mɔɖeɖedɔa me:
approval.step1: Wɔla tsɔa nyatakakawo ɖona ɖa to asiƒoƒo ɖe ‘Ðe ɖa be woada asi ɖe edzi’ dzi.
approval.step2: Emenyawo adze le dɔdzikpɔla ƒe Dadaɖeanyi ƒe Fli me
approval.step3: Dɔdzikpɔla léa ŋku ɖe emenyawo, dzesiwo, kple numekuku me tsonu ŋu
approval.step4: Dɔdzikpɔla da asi ɖe emenyawo dzi, biaa tɔtrɔwo, alo gbea emenyawo
approval.status1: Draft: Wole dɔ wɔm tso emenyawo ŋu, womeɖo wo ɖa haɖe o
approval.status2: Wole Lalam be Woada Asi Ðe Eŋu: Wotsɔe ɖo ɖa eye wole lalam be dɔdzikpɔla nalé ŋku ɖe eŋu
approval.status3: Woda asi ɖe edzi: Wole klalo be yewoatae alo awɔ ɖoɖo ɖe eŋu
approval.status4: Hiahiãwo ƒe Totoɖeme: Dɔdzikpɔla bia be woawɔ tɔtrɔwo - lé ŋku ɖe nyaŋuɖoɖowo ŋu eye nàgaɖoe ɖa ake
approval.tip: Tsɔ nuŋlɔɖiwo kpee ne èle nyatakakawo ɖom ɖa be nàna nya siwo ƒo xlãe nadzro numetola siwo ku ɖe wò nuwɔwɔ ŋuti nyametsotsowo ŋu. Esia wɔnɛ be mɔɖeɖedɔa wɔwɔ kabakaba.

gdpr.cookieDescription: Míezãa cookies tsɔ doa wò nyatakakadzraɖoƒewo ɖe ŋgɔ, tsɔa nyatakaka siwo sɔ na wò, eye míedzroa míaƒe ʋuwo ƒe zɔzɔ me. Ne èzi "Lɔ̃ Ðe Wo Katã" dzi la, efia be èlɔ̃ ɖe edzi be míazã cookies. Àte ŋu atrɔ asi le wò didiwo ŋu alo agbe cookies siwo mele vevie o.
gdpr.customizePreferences: Trɔ Asi Le Nusiwo Nàdi Ŋu
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Wohiã na ɖaseɖiɖi, dedienɔnɔ, kple dɔwɔwɔ veviwo. Womate ŋu awɔe nuwɔametɔe o.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Kpe ɖe mía ŋu míase alesi amedzrowo wɔa nu kple míaƒe nuƒolanɔƒea be míaƒe dɔwɔnawo nanyo ɖe edzii gɔme.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Wozãnɛ tsɔ naa boblododo siwo wowɔ na ame ŋutɔ eye wodzidzea dɔa ƒe dɔwɔwɔ nyuie.
